newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Van Der Moolen Fox as Cockerill options trader.
newsitem.headline: Van Der Moolen Fox as Cockerill options trader.

text.p: BEL-20 options market maker Van Der Moolen Fox BV will on Tuesday become designated market maker in options on Cockerill, the Belgian futures and options exchange, Belfox, said on Monday.
The designated market maker is a market maker in equity options who provides permanent buy and sell prices for an option in a specific share.
Other market makers in equity options are AOT Belgium, Corluy, Deeway, Servais, KB-Securities, Nedee, Petercam, Puilaetco and Timber Hill Deutschland.
